message:
We come to a street lined with extravagant villas.

Even here, there's something of a class system. The buildings range from palatial mansions to smaller, but still nice, houses.
We're staying in one of the latter, a small two-story building at the end of the block.

name: 蒼葉
message: "I guess this is it?"
Compared to the other buildings, ours looks a bit older.
There's a plate with the word "GLITTER" above the door.
The neighboring building has a different word above its door, so I assume that must be its name.

name: ミンク
message: "Show it your Coil."
Mink jerks his chin at the access panel by the door.
I hold my Coil up to the screen and turn the old-fashioned doorknob.
When I step inside, my eyes go wide.
The interior looks just as old-fashioned as the place did from the outside.

name: ミンク
message: "Pretty dated."
Mink scans the decor with a bored expression.
There's one thing we can agree on.
With all the wood in the room, it feels almost like we've been transported to another world.
Everything looks expensive and well cared for. There's even a grand staircase heading up to the second floor.

name: 蒼葉
message: "This is kinda amazing..."
I sit down on the couch for a moment and look around the room.
The couch is a lot softer than I thought it'd be. I feel myself sinking into the cushions.
I lean back, a deep sigh spilling from my mouth.
It's been so long since I had a moment's rest...
Plus, Mink being here isn't making it any easier...
My eyelids grow heavy as I start to sink deeper into the sofa.
Can't... fall asleep here... shit...
But I really don't have the energy to get up right now...
I don't even want to get up...
We ran the whole way here...
I can get away with just a little nap...
Just a little...
